resources.name: Get Current User
resources.description: Returns data for the currently authenticated user

resources.name: Fetch Country With States
resources.description: Returns the country with associated states

resources.name: Fetch Transaction
resources.description: Returns a paginated list of the a user's transactions

resources.name: List Plans
resources.description: This endpoint displays a listing of all plans which a patient can subscribe to. It is accessible to only admin and patients

resources.name: Fetch Appointments
resources.description:
Fetches a list of appointments by their status as query params. Only available to admin

### Status Allowed:
all, pending, urgent, confirmed

resources.name: Fetch All Doctors
resources.description: Returns a list(not paginated) of doctors and their medical profile

resources.name: All Doctors Paginated
resources.description: Returns a paginated list of doctors and their medical profile

resources.name: Search for a doctor
resources.description: Allows the admin to search for a doctor by first name or last name

resources.name: Fetch Single Doctor
resources.description: Returns a list(not paginated) of doctors and their medical profile

resources.name: Fetch All Patients
resources.description: Fetches a paginated list of patients with their appointments and consultations

resources.name: Fetch Single Patient
resources.description: Fetches data for a single patient with related appointments and consultations

resources.name: Search for patient
resources.description:
Returns a result of patients that match the search. Admin can search by two values:

```query```: Click ID, first name, last name and email of the patient. Name of company, name of HMO

```type```: patient, company, hmo

resources.name: Create HMO
resources.description: Adds an HMO

resources.name: Edit HMO
resources.description: Adds an HMO

resources.name: Create Schedule
resources.description: This endpoint allows a doctor to create his work schedule

resources.name: Fetch Schedule
resources.description: This endpoint allows a doctors to retrieve and view thier current work schedule

resources.name: Update Schedule
resources.description: Allows a doctor to update his schedule. Takes the schedule ID as query param

resources.name: Delete Schedule
resources.description: Allows a doctor to delete a schedule he has created. Receives the schedule ID as query param

resources.name: Fetch Doctor Prescription
resources.description: Fetch the prescription associated with a patient

resources.name: Fetch Patient Prescription
resources.description: Fetch the prescription associated with a patient
